attributes.action: Authorise our Royal Navy to use their firepower and adopt hunt & kill policies against Somali Pirates and assert that the UK considers the Human Rights of pirates as forfeited. Demand that the EU adopt simliar policies and send military reinforcements in to Somali Territory to establish order.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Presently, our Royal Navy cannot effectively use its firepower on Somali Pirates due to Human Rights Laws and ineffective decision making back in the UK. This petition aims to give the Green-Light to our navy to use whatever force necesssary to sink pirate vessels and establish that the UK views their human rights as forfeighted. It also demands that the UK pressure the EU to send military reinforcements into Somali Territory to establish some order & neutralize the threat.
